nodes.text: Luftgriffs were creatures on Vandor that flocked together. The owner of The Lodge, Tibbs Ospe, once threatened to feed the smuggler Lando Calrissian to luftgriffs for skipping out on his tab, but following the raid on Kessel, Calrissian returned and paid his debts.
Luftriffs are mentioned in the 2018 Studio Fun International replica journal Solo: A Star Wars Story: Tales from Vandor.
